author: etnu
msg: Switched caching to be more friendly to EhCache, and made EhCache the defacto standard. Auto wiring still uses just LruCache, but web.xml shows how to use EhCache instead.
This also radically simplifies cache interaction in general, and pushes the burden of support into the configuration layer.

HttpResponse is the only thing I've added serialization support for because GadgetSpec and MessageBundles should generally be cached in memory rather than via shared cache or on disk. If someone feels inclined to add support for serializing these as well, it might be useful.
This is an empty revision for padding.
